item.title: This 25-Year-Old Biotech Founder Says His Startup Can ‘Optimize’ Embryos for Intelligence
item.description: Nucleus Genomics founder Kian Sadeghi is making bold claims about his company’s genetic testing technology.

item.title: Half of Your Employees May Be Pretending to Work, According to a New Survey
item.description: It’s called ‘ghostworking,’ and a recent poll of workers shows that it’s more prevalent than you think.

item.title: Businesses Plan to Pass Half of Trump Tariff Costs to Customers
item.description: Most companies will not be absorbing expenses from import taxes, according to the Federal Reserve.

item.title: How Your Company Can Avoid the Summertime Blues as Vacation Requests Surge
item.description: New data shows summertime requests for days off surge 40 percent compared to other seasons.

item.title: Amazon to Spend $20 Billion on Data Centers in Pennsylvania
item.description: One of the two new Amazon data centers will be next to a nuclear plant, and will essentially plug right into it.
